document_data.name: Ensnaring Strike
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ensnaring strike''''' was a [[conjuration]] [[spell]] that gave a strike the chance of ensnaring a target with vines.
document_data.Effects:
The target was covered with vines. If the target couldn't muscle their way out of the vines, they would be trapped in them. The vines would last up to a minute and damaged the victim every couple of seconds. If the target was large, then it would more easily break the vines' hold.

If the spell was cast with a higher spell level, then the vines would hurt more.
document_data.Components: Only a [[verbal component]] was needed for the casting of this spell.
